title: The Meeting
description: Nothing will ever be the same after Mr. Michael Strauss, President and CEO of Strauss Medical, entices young, Nurse Trisha Saul into staying late one evening. Seducing her in the office. Trisha has never felt so good. So right. She craved his touch. But, can she give him everything he needs?Mr. Michael Strauss has big plans after savoring the sweet, young, Nurse. He canâ€™t get enough of her. But, would she agree to his terms?
author: Cami Stark
